mapper.select: select bb.* from ( select aa.*, rownum rnum, nvl((select count(*) from purchasefilm pf where pf.branchnum=#{branchNum} and pf.filmnum=aa.filmnum) ,0) buy from ( select f.filmNum, f.filmName, f.filmStory, f.filmStart, f.filmEnd, f.filmHead, f.filmStatus, g.genreNum, g.genreName, m.filmNum mfilenum, m.movieImgUrl from film f left join genre g on f.genreNum=g.genreNum left join movieimg m on f.filmNum=m.filmNum order by f.filmNum asc )aa )bb where rnum>=#{startRow} and rnum<=#{endRow}
select t.totalPeople,t.totalPrice,to_char(t.totalDate,'YYYY-MM-DD') totalDate,f.filmPrice from total t,film f where f.filmName=#{filmName} and t.filmNum = f.filmNum order by t.totalDate

select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select f.filmName,f.filmStory,mi.movieUrl,mi.movieImgUrl,SUM(m.mScore) vg from mReview m,film f,movieImg mi where f.filmNum=m.filmNum and f.filmNum=mi.filmNum group by f.filmName,f.filmStory,mi.movieUrl,mi.movieImgUrl order by vg desc ) aa ) where rnum<=4

select filmNum,filmName from film
where filmstart<=sysdate and filmstatus='상영중'
select to_char(max(filmend),'yyyy-MM-dd') filmend from film where filmnum in (select filmnum from purchasefilm where branchNum=#{branchNum})

select * from ( select aa.*,rownum rnum from ( select f.filmName,f.filmHead,t.totalpeople,mr.likeTotal,mr.mScore,m.memName,m.memId,mr.rContent from total t,film f,mReview mr,membership m where totalpeople = (select MAX(totalpeople) from total where to_char(totaldate,'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yy/mm/dd')) and t.totalpeople = (select MAX(totalpeople) from total where to_char(totaldate,'yy/mm/dd') = to_char(sysdate-1,'yy/mm/dd')) and f.filmNum = t.filmNum and f.filmNum=mr.filmNum and m.memNum = mr.memNum order by mr.likeTotal desc ) aa ) where rnum<=4;

select trunc(totalpeople/totalSum*100,1) rRate,bb.*,trunc(nvl((select avg(mscore) from mreview mr where bb.filmnum=mr.filmnum),0),1) mRate from (select aa.*, m.movieimgUrl, nvl((select sum(totalpeople)from total t where aa.filmnum=t.filmnum),0) totalPeople, (select sum(totalCount) from (select (select sum(totalpeople) total from total t where aa.filmnum=t.filmnum) totalCount from ( select filmName, filmNum from film where filmend>=sysdate )aa, movieimg m where m.filmNum= aa.filmNum)) totalSum from ( select filmName, filmNum from film where filmend>=sysdate )aa, movieimg m where m.filmNum= aa.filmNum order by totalPeople desc)bb

select trunc(nvl(totalpeople/totalSum*100,0)) rrate,bb.*,trunc(nvl((select avg(mscore) from mreview mr where bb.filmnum=mr.filmnum),0),1) mRate from (select aa.*, m.movieimgUrl, nvl((select sum(totalpeople)from total t where aa.filmnum=t.filmnum),0) totalPeople, (select nvl(sum(totalCount),1) from (select (select sum(totalpeople) total from total t where aa.filmnum=t.filmnum) totalCount from ( select filmName, filmNum from film where filmend>=sysdate )aa, movieimg m where m.filmNum= aa.filmNum)) totalSum from ( select filmName, filmNum from film where filmend>=sysdate )aa, movieimg m where m.filmNum= aa.filmNum order by totalPeople desc)bb where filmNum=#{filmNum}

from ( select filmName, filmNum from film where filmend>=sysdate )aa, movieimg m where m.filmNum= aa.filmNum)) totalSum from ( select filmName, filmNum from film where filmend>=sysdate )aa, movieimg m where m.filmNum= aa.filmNum)bb order by totalPeople desc
